headline: Has Amex’s 237% Five Year Rally Outrun Its Premium Card Expansion Story?
summary: If you are wondering whether American Express is still attractive after its huge run, or if you are late to the party, this breakdown will help you decide whether the current price makes long term sense. The stock has climbed 1.8% over the last week, 5.3% in the past month, and is now up 28.4% year to date, capping a powerful multiyear rally of 237.0% over five years. Recent headlines have focused on American Express expanding premium card perks and deepening co branded partnerships. This...
